subject: Horse Racing
Slaughterhouses
Breeding of Animals
Kentucky Derby
organizations: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: While the track-side euthanasia of Eight Belles in 2008 opened many fans’ eyes to the dangers of racing, more racehorse deaths are traced to the slaughter industry and the global meat market.
snippet: While the track-side euthanasia of Eight Belles in 2008 opened many fans’ eyes to the dangers of racing, more racehorse deaths are traced to the slaughter industry and the global meat market.
